title: Tongue Tied (Red Dwarf song)
text:
"Tongue Tied" is a song by <a href="Danny%20John-Jules">Danny John-Jules</a> (credited as "<a href="Cat%20%28Red%20Dwarf%29">The Cat</a>") featured in the 1988 "<a href="Red%20Dwarf">Red Dwarf</a>" episode "<a href="Parallel%20Universe%20%28Red%20Dwarf%29">Parallel Universe</a>" and released as a single in 1993. It reached number 17 on the UK charts.
The episode begins with Cat using a dream recorder, attempting to find a specific dream. He views a dream in which he sings "Tongue Tied"/"The Cat" with Lister and Rimmer, with dancers in the background. It also appears at the disco in the middle of the episode.
